mapper.select: select t.*, m.id as modelId, m.model_name as modelName, m.model_type as modelType, m.model_main as modelMain, m.model_path as modelPath, m.model_args as modelArgs, m.spark_opts as sparkOpts, m.schedule_rule as scheduleRule from tb_basic_tag t inner join tb_tag_model m on t.id=m.tag_id where t.level=4
